title: Cricket Batting Movement Organization Analysis: Simulation-Based Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered training to improve cognitive-motor coordination skills for professional workers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the movement organization patterns of cricket batters in VR simulation environments
Learners can comparatively explain differences in motor control between actual game conditions and experimental conditions (initiation timing, bat speed, contact accuracy)
Learners can verify the impact of information sources (pitcher motion, ball trajectory) on motor performance through simulation experiments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
